ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Promotional_Discount__c), OR( Promotional_Discount__c = 'a1h46000002h3sU', Promotional_Discount__c = 'a1h46000000oT98', Promotional_Discount__c = 'a1h4p000003qC81', Promotional_Discount__c = 'a1h4p000002amaX', Promotional_Discount__c = 'a1h8Z000002q2ly', Promotional_Discount__c = 'a1h8Z000002q4vW' ), $User.Alias != 'aivan', $User.Alias != 'bmath' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: See Ana for applying this discount
